T02D2634:179b-1: sarba du rga ti pa ri sho dha na au p'a ya n'a ma /
T02D2634:179b-3: ngan song thams cad sbyong ba'i thabs zhes bya ba /
T02D2634:179b-4: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2634:179b-5: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
T02D2634:179b-6: yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngan song thams
T02D2634:179b-7: cad rnam par sbyong ba gzi brjid kyi rgyal po
T02D2634:179b-9: gang zhig dam tshig la brtan par gnas shing slob dpon las tshul bzhin dbang zob pa /
T02D2634:179b-10: gsang sngags kyi rgyud dang cho ga'i bye brag la
T02D2634:179b-11: mkhas shing bdag dang gzhan gyi don bsgrub pa la
T02D2634:179b-12: brtson pa des byams pa dang /
T02D2634:180a-0: snying rje chan po'i sems kyis sems can @180a * //
T02D2634:180a-1: gang dag 'chi ba'i dus byas te /
T02D2634:180a-2: mi dge ba'i rnam par smin pas ngan song gsum gyi sdug bsngal myong bar gyur pa dang //
T02D2634:180a-4: mtho ris kyi bde ba la dgod pa'i phyir ngan
T02D2634:180a-5: song rnam par sbyong ba'i brtag pa las byung ba'i
T02D2634:180a-6: shi ba'i cho ga bya bar 'os so //
T02D2634:180a-8: de bzhin dkyil 'khor bris nas ni //
T02D2634:180a-9: de ltar yang ni gsum pa la //
T02D2634:180a-10: brgya rtsa brgyad du bslas nas ni //
T02D2634:180a-11: dbang bskur ba ni rab tu brtag / de nas sdig pa kun sbyangs te //
T02D2634:180a-12: dmyal ba la sogs sdug bsngal las //
T02D2634:180a-13: de ni myur du rnam par thar //
T02D2634:180a-14: rim gyis byang chub thob par 'gyur //
T02D2634:180a-16: ngan song rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil
T02D2634:180a-17: 'khor gzhung las smos pa bzhin du bris nas bum
T02D2634:180a-18: pa lnga bzhag pa la rigs lnga so so'i snying
T02D2634:180a-19: po bum pa re re la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas
T02D2634:180a-20: te / shi ba'i ro'am gzugs brnyan la tshul bzhin
T02D2634:180a-21: du dbang bskur na myur du sdug bsngal las grol
T02D2634:180a-22: te / bar 'gyur ro // thabs gzhan yang rgyud las /
T02D2634:180a-23: de nas rnal 'byor can gyis ni //
T02D2634:180a-24: sngags dang phyag rgyas de dbang bskur //
T02D2634:180a-25: lha yi gzugs su brtags nas kyang //
T02D2634:180a-26: mchod rten dbus su gzhag par bya//
T02D2634:180a-27: rang gi lha'am lha gzhan gyi //
T02D2634:180a-28: snying po snying gar bris nas kyang //
T02D2634:180a-29: lha 'dra bar yang sems bskyed de //
T02D2634:180a-30: khyim gyi nang du gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2634:180a-32: shi ba'i ro'am gzugs brnyan ni sngags dang phyag rgyas
T02D2634:180a-33: tshul bzhin du dbang bskur nas lha yin no bar
T02D2634:180a-35: lam gyi bzhi mdor mchod rten chen po byas pa'i dbus su bzhag pa'am /
T02D2634:180a-36: de ltar ma nus na ni shi ba nyid kyi yi dam gyi lha'am /
T02D2634:180a-37: ngan song rnam par sbyong ba dang /
T02D2634:180a-38: de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa la sogs pa
T02D2634:180a-39: lha gzhan gyi snying po ro'am gzugs brnyan gyi snying
T02D2634:180a-40: gar bris la / de lha yin par sems bskyed de /
T02D2634:180a-41: dur ram mchod pa'i nang du bcug na sdig pa rnams byang bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2634:180a-43: de yi ming nas smos nas ni //
T02D2634:180a-44: gu kum bzang pos sngags bris te /
T02D2634:180a-45: rim gyis 'bum ni tshang tsam du /
T02D2634:180b-0: mchod rten las @180b ni rab tu bya //
T02D2634:180b-1: sdig can sdig ni zad bya'i phyir //
T02D2634:180b-2: bye ba snyed ni tshang bar bya //
T02D2634:180b-3: de ni nges par dmyal ba las //
T02D2634:180b-5: yi dags byol song sdug bsngal las //
T02D2634:180b-6: grol te lha yi gnas su skye //
T02D2634:180b-8: shi ba'i ming dang rigs lnga'i snying po spel zhing
T02D2634:180b-9: gro ga la gur kum gyis bris nas mchod rten
T02D2634:180b-11: tsha tsha 'bum tshang bar gzhung bzhin du gdab /
T02D2634:180b-12: sdig pa shin tu che na mchod rten bye ba
T02D2634:180b-13: tshang bar btab na ngan song gsum las grol zhing
T02D2634:180b-14: lha'i gnas su skye bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2634:180b-16: de yi ming nas brjod nas ni //
T02D2634:180b-17: ji skad gsung ba'i sngags bzlas shing //
T02D2634:180b-18: 'bum phrag stong ngam yang na ni //
T02D2634:180b-19: brgya phrag stong du tshang ba dang //
T02D2634:180b-20: bye ba snyed du rab bzlas na //
T02D2634:180b-21: lha yi gnas su nges par skye //
T02D2634:180b-23: sngags mkhan nyid lha'i rnal 'byor du byas la /
T02D2634:180b-24: shi ba'i ming dang lha'i snying po rnams spel zhing bzlas brjod gzhung bzhin du 'bum phrag stong ngam /
T02D2634:180b-26: bye ba tshad par bzlas na lha'i gnas su skye bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2634:180b-28: de yi ming nas brjod nas ni /
T02D2634:180b-30: / yang na brgya phrag stong du snyed /
T02D2634:180b-31: sbyin sreg byas par gyur na ni //
T02D2634:180b-32: dmyal ba chen por gyur pa yi //
T02D2634:180b-33: sdig pa de las thar bar 'gyur //
T02D2634:180b-35: shi ba'i ming dang snying po rnams spel zhing tshul bzhin du sbyin sreg gi las byas te /
T02D2634:180b-36: grangs 'bum phrag brgya'am brgya phrag stong tshang bar bzlas
T02D2634:180b-37: shing sbyin sreg byas na ngan song las thar bar
T02D2634:180b-38: 'gyur ro // yang na gzhung nyid las smos pa'i
T02D2634:180b-39: me'i mdog dkar zhing me lce g-yas su 'khyil ba
T02D2634:180b-40: la sogs pa ltas bzang po rnams byung ba'i bar
T02D2634:180b-43: sbyin sreg dkyil 'khor dam pa ni //
T02D2634:180b-44: sbyin sreg rab tu bya ba yin //
T02D2634:180b-46: sbyin sreg gi dkyil 'khor bzhengs su gsol te /
T02D2634:180b-47: dbang bskur nas me thab tu sbyin sreg bya ba dang /
T02D2634:180b-48: tsha tsha btab nas bzlas brjod la sogs bya dgos te /
T02D2634:181a-1: thabs rnam par rgyud nyid las gsal bar rab tu smos so //
T02D2634:181a-2: de yang sbyin sreg gi dkyil 'khor byed par 'dod pas /
T02D2634:181a-4: gzugs brnyan gyi snying gar shi ba nyid kyi me tog gang la phog pa'i yi dam gyi lha'am /
T02D2634:181a-5: lha med na ngan song rnam par sbyong ba la
T02D2634:181a-6: sogs pa lha gzhan gang yang rung ba'i snying po
T02D2634:181a-7: gro ga la gur kum gyis bris te snying gar
T02D2634:181a-8: gdags / las kyi sgrib pa rnam par sbyong ba'i
T02D2634:181a-9: snying po de bzhin du bris nas spyi bor gdags
T02D2634:181a-10: gdags / te / snying gar bris pa'i snying po
T02D2634:181a-11: gang yin pa de lha de nyid du ro de
T02D2634:181a-12: gyur par bsam zhing byin gyis brlabs nas /
T02D2634:181a-13: gtsang ma'i nang du khri'am stegs bu'i steng du kha nub tu bstan la gzhag go //
T02D2634:181a-14: sngags mkhan shar du kha bltas nas bdun du mandala
T02D2634:181a-15: byas nas zhi ba dang ldan pa'i mchod pa rnams
T02D2634:181a-16: dgram zhing / mchod sbyin gyi gtor ma cha gnyis tshul bzhin du bshams /
T02D2634:181a-18: de nas bdag nyid rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor du
T02D2634:181a-19: gzhung bzhin du byas nas bde bar gshegs pa sras
T02D2634:181a-20: dang bcas pa spyan drangs te /
T02D2634:181a-21: phyag byas la mchod pa dbul zhing thugs dam bskul ba dang /
T02D2634:181a-22: dam tshig can rnams la gtor ma phul te phrin
T02D2634:181a-23: las bcol ba dang 'gro ba la sbyin pa rgya
T02D2634:181a-24: cher spel bas lan chags bral bar byas pa la
T02D2634:181a-25: sogs pa gzhung gzhan dang mthun par byas nas bde
T02D2634:181a-26: bar gshegs pa de dag gis thugs kar bzlas bya'i
T02D2634:181a-27: yi ge na mo bha ga ba te bya ba'am
T02D2634:181a-29: zhes bya ba gang yang rung ba bkod la /
T02D2634:181a-30: de bzhin du bdag gi snying gar yang bsams te /
T02D2634:181a-31: gzhung bzhin du zhi ba'i ming dang sngags spel zhing zhag ci nus tsam gyis bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02D2634:181a-32: chog shes pa gzhan yod na gnas de nyid dam
T02D2634:181a-33: gzhan nyid du zhi ba'i thab khung tshul bzhin du
T02D2634:181a-34: brtsigs nas phyag rgya bzhi bkod de /
T02D2634:181a-35: mchod pa dang gtor ma dang sreg rdzas la sogs
T02D2634:181a-36: pa gzhung bzhin du bshams nas mchod pa dang gtor
T02D2634:181a-37: ma tshul bzhin du dbul zhing btang ba dang /
T02D2634:181a-38: sbyin sreg gi cho ga byas pa la sogs pa zhag ci nus kyis bya'o //
T02D2634:181b-0: gzhan yang sgrib pa sbyangs shing tshogs bsag @181b pa'i
T02D2634:181b-1: phyir mchod rten gdab pa dang mdo sde zab mo
T02D2634:181b-2: bklag pa dang / sbyin pa 'byor tshad btang ba
T02D2634:181b-3: la sogs pa dge ba'i las rgya cher bya bar
T02D2634:181b-4: bklag pa dang / rigs so // de ltar dge ba'i phyogs ci nus pa byas nas /
T02D2634:181b-5: sa phyogs brtags par sa'i cho ga gzhung bzhin du
T02D2634:181b-6: byas la dkyil 'khor ngos gcig po la khru drug
T02D2634:181b-7: pa grub zhi dpang khru gang ba zhig byas pa'i
T02D2634:181b-8: dbus su / me thab kho ra khor yug tu
T02D2634:181b-9: khru do pa zlum po zabs su khru gang pa
T02D2634:181b-10: dbus su / / mu ran 'phang dang zheng sor bzhi bzhi pa zlum por bskor /
T02D2634:181b-11: lci bas skyang nul legs par bya /
T02D2634:181b-12: sa dkar pos bsku zhing dris byug / de nas
T02D2634:181b-13: thig skud legs pa cig gis tshul bzhin du thig
T02D2634:181b-14: btab nas / tshon phye sna lngas bri ba ni
T02D2634:181b-15: me thab kyi dbus su 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa
T02D2634:181b-16: gcig bya ba ni shar du rdo rje /
T02D2634:181b-19: byang du sna tshogs rdo rje rnams tshul bzhin du bkod do //
T02D2634:181b-20: mu ran la rdo rje rkyang pa'i ra ba rtse lnga pa'am /
T02D2634:181b-22: de'i phyi rim gyi 'khor lo rtsibs bcu drug la
T02D2634:181b-23: shar gyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs bzhi la rdo rje dang
T02D2634:181b-24: lcags kyu dang mda' dang mgu bar ston pa rnams
T02D2634:181b-25: dgod do // lho'i rtsibs bzhi la nor bu rin
T02D2634:181b-26: po che dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang yid bzhin
T02D2634:181b-27: gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan dang so'i phreng ba rnams
T02D2634:181b-28: dgod do // dgod do // nub kyi 'khor lo'i
T02D2634:181b-29: rtsibs bzhi la rdo rje padma dang ral gri dang
T02D2634:181b-30: 'khor lo dang dung rnams dgod do //
T02D2634:181b-31: byang phyogs kyi rtsibs bzhi la rdo rje kha bzhi
T02D2634:181b-32: pa dang go cha dang mche ba dang khu tshur
T02D2634:181b-33: rnams dgod do // de'i phyi rim gyi gru chad
T02D2634:181b-34: kyi shar lhor smin ma 'degs pa'i tshul dang bdug
T02D2634:181b-35: rnams dgod do // pa dang / lho nub tu rin po che'i phreng ba dang me tog dang /
T02D2634:181b-36: nub byang du yid du 'ong ba'i glu dang mar me dang /
T02D2634:181b-37: byang shar du gar byed pa'i mtshan nyid dang /
T02D2634:181b-39: de'i phyi rim snam bu la phyag rgya bzhis gtams pa dgod do //
T02D2634:181b-40: de'i phyi rim gyi snam bu la shar du rdo rje gdeng po dang zla ba /
T02D2634:181b-43: lho nub tu ral gri / nub tu zhags pa dang /
T02D2634:181b-48: byang shar du mdung rtse gsum pa rnams dgod do //
T02D2634:182a-1: rim gyi sgo bzhi'i shar du lcags kyu /
T02D2634:182a-3: nub tu lcags sgrog byang du dril bu rnams dgod do //
T02D2634:182a-4: gzhan yang dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan them skas bzhi'i phreng
T02D2634:182a-5: ba dang lda ldi dang do shal dang dril bu
T02D2634:182a-6: dang rnga ma dang seng ge dang ba lang la
T02D2634:182a-8: de yang rgyud las khru bzhi pa yi tshad du ni /
T02D2634:182a-9: cho ga bzhin du khung brkos la //
T02D2634:182a-10: rdo rjes mtha' ma bskor ba yi //
T02D2634:182a-11: 'khor lo dbus su bri bar bya //
T02D2634:182a-12: rigs lnga yi ni phyag rgya rnams //
T02D2634:182a-13: ji bzhin pa yi phyogs su bri //
T02D2634:182a-14: ji bzhin sems dpa' rnams dang ni //
T02D2634:182a-15: 'jig rten gtso la sogs pa bri //
T02D2634:182a-17: de ltar sbyin sreg gi dkyil 'khor smos nas bum pa chus bkang ba /
T02D2634:182a-18: sman dang 'bru dang rin po che dang mgul chings
T02D2634:182a-19: dang bum pa'i kha rgyan la sogs pa gzhung dang
T02D2634:182a-20: mthun par byas pa lnga yan chad dgod pa dang
T02D2634:182a-21: / lha bshos snod gtsang mas bkang ba brgyad dam bcu drug snyed kyi bza' ba dang /
T02D2634:182a-22: bca' ba dang btung ba sna tshogs pa dang /
T02D2634:182a-23: me tog dang bdug pa dang /
T02D2634:182a-24: byug pa dang mar me la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams dang /
T02D2634:182a-25: me tog gi phreng ba dang rgyal mtshan dang /
T02D2634:182a-26: bla re dang gdugs dang ba dan dang 'phan la sogs pas brgyan pa dang /
T02D2634:182a-27: dkyil 'khor gyi me tog sil ma bkram zhing ku shas bskor ro //
T02D2634:182a-28: mchod yon gyi gtor ma rgyas par cha gnyis kyang bsham mo //
T02D2634:182a-30: chu sogs bum pa gang ba dang //
T02D2634:182a-31: gtor mas snod rnams bkang ba dang //
T02D2634:182a-32: brgyad snyed tsam du gzhag bya snyam //
T02D2634:182a-33: yang na bcu drug steng du gzhag / bza' ba dang ni bca' ba'i bshos //
T02D2634:182a-34: me tog phreng sogs de bzhin te //
T02D2634:182a-35: bla re rgyal mtshan dar la sogs //
T02D2634:182a-36: gdugs mchog rnams ni legs par brgyan //
T02D2634:182a-38: gzhan yang sbyin sreg gi yo byad mar khu dang 'o ma dang til dang /
T02D2634:182a-43: dri zhim po las byas pa'i sor brgyad dam /
T02D2634:182a-44: sor nyi shu bzhi'i bar dang /
T02D2634:182a-45: bud shing 'o ma can skam po zlum po rnams dang /
T02D2634:182b-0: ga phur dang gur @182b kum la sogs pa dri zhim pa rnams bsag go //
T02D2634:182b-2: ga pur gur kum la sogs pa /
T02D2634:182b-3: mar dang 'o ma til bskol la //
T02D2634:182b-4: til dang yungs kar 'bras rnams dang //
T02D2634:182b-5: dri yi chus ni legs bkang ste //
T02D2634:182b-6: 'bras chan yos dang d'ur ba dang //
T02D2634:182b-7: sprang rtsi sha khar mar ldan pa ;
T02D2634:182b-8: / brgya phrag du mar yongs bzlas pa //
T02D2634:182b-9: yam shing la yang de bzhin du //
T02D2634:182b-11: de ltar mchod pa'i yo byad rnams bsags te /
T02D2634:182b-12: bdag nyid rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor du byas la /
T02D2634:182b-13: dkyil 'khor gyi yo byad kun la las thams cad pa'am /
T02D2634:182b-14: ngan song sbyong ba'i sngags kyis gdab /
T02D2634:182b-15: sreg rdzas kun la yang ngan song sbyong ba'i sngags kyis gdab /
T02D2634:182b-16: brgya rtsa brgya phrag du mar bzlas so //
T02D2634:182b-17: de nas las thams cad pa'am /
T02D2634:182b-18: 'phags pa mi g-yo ba'i sngags dang phyag rgyas bgegs bskrad cing mtshams bcad do //
T02D2634:182b-19: rdo rje rab dang dra ba dang phur bu la sogs pa'i sngags sam rgyud dang ldan par bya'o //
T02D2634:182b-20: de nas bdag nyid kyi snying gar sna tshogs rdo rjes bsdus pas 'phags pa spyan drangs te /
T02D2634:182b-21: phyag rgya bzhis bzhugs su gsol nas /
T02D2634:182b-22: yon chab la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams tshul bzhin du dbul lo //
T02D2634:182b-24: cho ga shes par bris nas kyang //
T02D2634:182b-25: lha rnams mang po spyan drangs nas //
T02D2634:182b-26: sngags shes pas ni sngags phyag rgyas //
T02D2634:182b-27: aargha phul bar shes nas kyang //
T02D2634:182b-28: mdor na mchod pa byas nas ni //
T02D2634:182b-29: lha yi sbyor bar rab gnas la //
T02D2634:182b-31: de nas gtor ma rnams tshul bzhin du byin gyis brlabs nas /
T02D2634:182b-32: dam tshig can rnams la gtor ma phul te /
T02D2634:182b-33: ming 'di zhes bya ba'i sgrib pa sbyang zhing /
T02D2634:182b-34: bdag 'gro ba'i don brtsam pa'i bstong [*bstod?] grogs mdzad du gsol zhes brjod do //
T02D2634:182b-35: 'gro ba spyir gtor ma bsngos nas /
T02D2634:182b-36: ming 'di zhes bya ba'i lan chags byang zhing bsod
T02D2634:182b-37: nams kyi tshogs su gyur cig ces brjod de gtang
T02D2634:182b-38: / sngags mkhan gzhan ma zhig yod na bum pa
T02D2634:182b-39: lnga la rigs lnga'i snying po dang shi ba'i ming
T02D2634:182b-40: spel zhing cung zad bzlas la de nas ngan song
T02D2634:182b-41: sbyong ba'i sngags ci mang du bzlas brjod bya /
T02D2634:183a-0: gzhan med na bdag nyid kyis bum pa gcig @183a * //
T02D2634:183a-1: la ngan song sbyong ba'i sngags ci nus kyis bzlas so //
T02D2634:183a-2: de nas bud shing la ngan song sbyong ba'i sngags
T02D2634:183a-3: kyis btab la brtsig / ro la ngan song sbyong
T02D2634:183a-4: ba'i sngags kyis mang du btab ste /
T02D2634:183a-5: bye ma'am yungs kar la bzlas shing gtor nas bum
T02D2634:183a-6: pa'i chus tshul bzhin du bkrus te ga pur dang
T02D2634:183a-7: gur kum la sogs pa'i dri rnams la ngan song
T02D2634:183a-8: sbyong ba'i sngags kyis btab ste ro la byug /
T02D2634:183a-9: gur kum gyis sngags bco brgyad tshul bzhin du bris
T02D2634:183a-21: gsang ba'i gnas rnams su gdab /
T02D2634:183a-22: de bzhin yid kyis kyang sngags rnams bkod de /
T02D2634:183a-23: de dag gi 'od zer gyis sgrib pa sbyangs par bsams /
T02D2634:183a-24: ngan song sbyong ba'i phyag rgya bcings shing /
T02D2634:183a-25: sarba bid bya ba'i sngags te /
T02D2634:183a-28: spyi bor btags pas lus ngag yid gsum gyi bag chags dag par dmigs so //
T02D2634:183a-29: de nas ro la ngan song sbyong ba'i sngags kyis btab pa'i gos kyis g-yogs nas /
T02D2634:183a-31: me tog gi phreng ba gdags shing /
T02D2634:183a-32: sngags kyis btab pa'i bdug pas kyang bdugs te /
T02D2634:183a-33: thab kyi dbus su stan dang bcas par bzhag ste /
T02D2634:183a-34: nub tu kha bstan la bdag nyid shar phyogs su kha bltas te las bya'o //
T02D2634:183a-36: rang gi sngags kyis btab pa'i shing //
T02D2634:183a-37: khung bu'i nang du gzhag par bya //
T02D2634:183a-38: ro la sngags kyis btab nas kyang //
T02D2634:183a-39: chu mchog gis ni bkrus nas ni //
T02D2634:183a-40: bzlas pa'i dri yis byug par bya //
T02D2634:183a-41: gos dang rgyan gyis klubs nas kyang //
T02D2634:183a-42: sngags kyis btab pa'i bdug pas bdug / me tog phreng la sogs pas mchod//
T02D2634:183a-43: snying ga lkog ma spyi bo ru //
T02D2634:183a-44: sarba bid kyis byin gyis brlab //
T02D2634:183a-45: de ltar gzhan du mi dge sngags //
T02D2634:183a-46: mchog tu dge ba rnams gzhag go //
T02D2634:183a-47: de nas ngan song sbyong ba'i phyir //
T02D2634:183a-48: stan dang bcas te de dbus su //
T02D2634:183a-49: gzhag pa nyid du bya ba yin //
T02D2634:183b-0: de nas rdo rje chos kyi bzlas @183b brjod byas
T02D2634:183b-1: pa'i chus thab kyi nye 'khor dang yo byad thams
T02D2634:183b-2: cad bsangs nas / sku gzugs la sogs pa mngon
T02D2634:183b-3: du phyogs par rtsva ku sha'i khri la bkra shis
T02D2634:183b-4: kyi skyil mo krung du 'dug nas /
T02D2634:183b-5: rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor du gsal bar byas la /
T02D2634:183b-7: dka' thub la dga' ba'i khyim nas blangs pa'i me la /
T02D2634:183b-8: rdo rje chos kyi bzlas brjod byas pa'i me bsangs te thab tu bcug la /
T02D2634:183b-9: las sna tshogs kyi snying po brjod cing rlung yab kyi rlung gis me sbar ro //
T02D2634:183b-10: de nas rang gi snying gar yi ge h'um gzhag ste /
T02D2634:183b-11: rnal 'byor gsal bar byas nas rdo rje me'i dam
T02D2634:183b-12: tshig gi phyag rgya rdo rje bcing ba dang bsdams
T02D2634:183b-13: pa byas nas / dam tshig gi sngags /
T02D2634:183b-14: aom badzra aa na la ma h'a bh'u ta dzv'a la ya /
T02D2634:183b-15: bhasmi ku ru sarba dusht'an h'um phat /
T02D2634:183b-16: ces brjod pas rdo rje me ma'i gzugs su gyur te /
T02D2634:183b-17: rid pa ring la gzi mdangs chen po g-yas bgrang phreng /
T02D2634:183b-18: g-yon ril ba spyi blugs thogs pa /
T02D2634:183b-21: me lce stong gis dkrigs shing 'od 'bar bar bsams nas mchod yon sngags kyis byin la /
T02D2634:183b-22: zhi ba dang mthun pa'i dgang gzar gyis mar gyi dgang blugs gsum sbyin /
T02D2634:183b-23: de nas yam shing gi thor to gnyis mar la
T02D2634:183b-24: bsres pa bsreg ste til mar dang spus pa gung
T02D2634:183b-25: mo dang srin lag dang mthe bo gsum gyis sam
T02D2634:183b-26: / blugs gzar gyis sreg blugs gsum sbyin /
T02D2634:183b-27: de nas mchod yon gyi chus kha lag bkrus nas bsang gtor byas te /
T02D2634:183b-29: drang srong chen po khyod rang gi 'bar ba nyid du bzhugs te /
T02D2634:183b-30: bdag nyid ji ltar 'dod pa'i sbyin sreg byed pa'i bar du gnas par gyis shig ces smras nas /
T02D2634:183b-31: me lha'i gzugs de nyid me'i rang bzhin 'bar ba nyid du bsam mo //
T02D2634:183b-33: de nas byin za dge ba rab spar la //
T02D2634:183b-34: me lce stong gis dkrigs shing 'bar ba'i sku //
T02D2634:183b-35: zla dkar kun da'i bzhin la zhi ba'i lus //
T02D2634:183b-36: mtha' yas pa yi gzugs kyis me bkug la //
T02D2634:183b-37: aargha dbul bar btag nas bde bzhin du //
T02D2634:183b-38: blo mchog ldan pa'i dbus su gzugs sogs bzhag / ces smos so //
T02D2634:184a-0: de nas sems dpa'i bzlas brjod byas pa'i mchod yon gyi snod g-yon rol du @184a * //
T02D2634:184a-1: gzhag / mchod pa'i yo byad gzhan g-yas rol du
T02D2634:184a-2: gzhag / dgang gzar dang blugs gzar mdun du bzhag
T02D2634:184a-3: nas / rang gi rnal 'byor gsal bar byas te /
T02D2634:184a-4: las sna tshogs kyi snying po brjod pas me 'bar
T02D2634:184a-5: ba de nyid kyi nang du rin po che'i gzhal
T02D2634:184a-6: yas khang bzang po lte ba dang bcas pa'i 'khor
T02D2634:184a-7: lo rtsibs bcu drug pa dang /
T02D2634:184a-13: phreng ba la sogs pas brgyan pa /
T02D2634:184a-14: dbus su seng ge dang padma dang zla ba'i gdan
T02D2634:184a-15: chen po dang gru bzhi dang 'khor lo'i rtsibs dang
T02D2634:184a-16: / gru chad dang sgor padma'i gdan dang /
T02D2634:184a-17: rin po che'i khri'u la sogs pas bkod nas /
T02D2634:184a-18: bdag gi snying gar sna tshogs rdo rje bsams la /
T02D2634:184a-19: rdo rje bsdu ba'i snying po /
T02D2634:184a-20: aom badzra sa ma y'a dza:/
T02D2634:184a-22: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bsnol te /
T02D2634:184a-23: dpung mgor gzhag / mdzub mo gnyis lcags kyu ltar byas te /
T02D2634:184a-24: gung mo dang mthe bong gnyis se gol brdabs pas /
T02D2634:184a-25: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'khor dang bcas pa rang rang gi gnas nas bskul te /
T02D2634:184a-26: ji ltar mchod par bsams pa'i gnas khor khor yug tu bzhugs par bsam mo //
T02D2634:184a-27: de nas shar phyogs kyi sgor lcags kyu'i las kyi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02D2634:184a-28: phyag rgya de nyid shar phyogs kyi sgor lcags kyur gyur par bsams la /
T02D2634:184a-29: aom badzra aam ku sha dza:/
T02D2634:184a-31: lcags kyus dgug pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2634:184a-32: rnams so so'i sgo drung du bzhugs par bsam mo
T02D2634:184a-33: // phyag rgya de nyid bkrol nas lho phyogs kyi sgor zhags pa'i phyag rgyas bcings te /
T02D2634:184a-34: phyag rgya de nyid lho phyogs kyi sgor zhags par bsams la /
T02D2634:184a-36: zhes brjod cing zhags pas drangs pa'i tshul gyis de
T02D2634:184a-37: bzhin gshegs pa rnams so so'i sgo drung du bzhugs
T02D2634:184a-38: par bsam mo // phyag rgya de nyid bkrol nas
T02D2634:184a-39: nub kyis gor lcags sgrog gi phyag rgya bcings te
T02D2634:184a-40: par bsam mo // / phyag rgya de nyid dang
T02D2634:184a-41: nub phyogs kyi sgor lcags sgrog tu gyur pas bsams
T02D2634:184a-42: par bsam mo // / la / aom badzra spho ta bam /
T02D2634:184a-43: zhes brjod cing lcags sgrog bsdams pa'i tshul gyis bdag
T02D2634:184b-0: nyid ji srid 'dod par de bzhin gshegs pa @184b
T02D2634:184b-2: phyag rgya de nyid bkrol nas byang phyogs kyi sgor
T02D2634:184b-3: rdo rje dbab pa las kyi phyag rgya bcings te
T02D2634:184b-4: / phyag rgya de nyid byang phyogs kyi sgor dril bur gyur par bsams la /
T02D2634:184b-5: aom badzra a'a be sha ho:/
T02D2634:184b-6: zhes brjod cing dril bu bskyod pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mnyes par bsams te /
T02D2634:184b-7: phyag rgya de nyid dgrol lo //
T02D2634:184b-8: de dag gi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan dang bzhugs
T02D2634:184b-9: tshul la sogs pa so so'i lta bas yun ring
T02D2634:184b-11: de nas so so'i dam tshig phyag rgya rdo rje bcings pa las bskyed de /
T02D2634:184b-12: so so'i sngags kyi mjug tu ;
T02D2634:184b-15: 'phags pa rnams dgyes shing dam tshig skong par bsams te /
T02D2634:184b-16: mchod yon phul nas bde bar gshegs so zhes brjod
T02D2634:184b-17: cing mchod pa gzhan rnams kyang rim bzhin du dbul
T02D2634:184b-18: lo // de nas sreg rdzas rnams la lha so so'i snying po dang /
T02D2634:184b-19: ngan song sbyong ba'i sngags bzlas te /
T02D2634:184b-20: 'od zer kha dog dkar por gyur par bsams nas rdzas re re zhing /
T02D2634:184b-21: aom bee ro tsa n'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2634:184b-22: che ge mo zhes bya ba sarba bid ces bya
T02D2634:184b-23: ba la sogs pa brjod cing rdzas rnams bsreg go
T02D2634:184b-24: // bzlas pa'i mthar ming 'di zhes bya ba'i nyon
T02D2634:184b-25: mongs pa'i sgrib pa rnams sh'antim ku ru zhes brjod
T02D2634:184b-26: // do // de bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi lha
T02D2634:184b-27: re re la lan brgya rtsa brgyad man chad du
T02D2634:184b-28: // do // dbul lo // de nas rdzas dang me thab la sogs pa bsangs te /
T02D2634:184b-29: ngan song sbyong ba'i lha la sreg rdzas nyi shu rtsa gcig tu dbul lo //
T02D2634:184b-30: de ltar mchod zin pa dang /
T02D2634:184b-31: 'phags pa rnams tshul bzhin du gshegs su gsol /
T02D2634:184b-32: de nas me lha yang thab khung du spyan drangs shing bsams la /
T02D2634:184b-33: mchod yon la sogs pas mchod cing /
T02D2634:184b-34: yo byad kun las lan gsum dbul lo //
T02D2634:184b-35: de nas yang me lha me 'bar ba nyid du gyur par bsam mo //
T02D2634:184b-37: ji skad gsungs pa'i yon tan 'dod pa yis //
T02D2634:184b-38: de bzhin gshegs sogs de ltar spyan drangs la /
T02D2634:184b-39: aargha la sogs btab ste de bzhin dbul //
T02D2634:184b-40: bde gshegs bsdus pa'i mchod pa gang yin bya //
T02D2634:184b-41: de nas bsreg bya bkang ste rim gyis ni //
T02D2634:184b-42: rgyal po la sogs brgya rtsa brgyad du btags //
T02D2634:185a-1: sbyong ba'i sngags kyis rgyal po la /
T02D2634:185a-2: bsreg bya nyi shu rtsa gcig tu ni brtags /
T02D2634:185a-3: de nas spyan drangs yo byad lan gsum dang /
T02D2634:185a-4: aargha la sogs padma dkar zhal mchod //
T02D2634:185a-6: de nas yang me thab dang yo byad rnams bsangs la /
T02D2634:185a-7: bdag nyid kyi snying gar yi ge h'um bzhag pa las /
T02D2634:185a-8: bdag nyid khro bo phyag na rdo rjer yi ge h'um zhes pas gyur te /
T02D2634:185a-9: bzhin dang cha lugs khro bo'i tshul can du bsams la /
T02D2634:185a-10: me thab tu yang yi ge h'um las rdo rje sems dpar gyur /
T02D2634:185a-11: rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs ka nas /
T02D2634:185a-12: aom badzra satva kro dha a'a na w'arka ma h'a badzra kro dha /
T02D2634:185a-14: bi dra ba bi dra ba /
T02D2634:185a-15: sarb'a p'a ya n'a sha ya n'a sha ya /
T02D2634:185a-16: ha ra ha ra pr'a n'a na h'um phat /
T02D2634:185a-18: khro bo thams gsum rnam par rgyal bar gyur te /
T02D2634:185a-19: sku mdog sngon po zhal bgrad cing mche ba gtsigs pa /
T02D2634:185a-20: phyag na rdo rje dang padma dang /
T02D2634:185a-21: ral gri la sogs pa grangs med pa'i mtshon cha bsnams pa /
T02D2634:185a-23: stag lpags kyis smad g-yogs pa 'khor khro bo mang
T02D2634:185a-24: pos bskor ba rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan gyis brgyan pa
T02D2634:185a-25: / zhabs padma lta bur ro mnan cing /
T02D2634:185a-26: thabs mkhas pa'i thugs rjes sdig pa sbyong bar mdzad par bsam mo //
T02D2634:185a-27: grub na de'i sku gzugs kyang mdun du gzhag go //
T02D2634:185a-28: de nas lag pa g-yon pas khu tshur bcangs la /
T02D2634:185a-29: mdzub mo bsgrengs te brang la sbyar zhing dpung pa dam du bcum la /
T02D2634:185a-30: lag pa g-yas pas sbyin sreg bya ste /
T02D2634:185a-31: sngags gong du smos pa dang /
T02D2634:185a-32: shi pa'i ming spel zhing 'bum mam /
T02D2634:185a-33: bye ba man chad bzlas pa'i sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D2634:185a-34: bar bar du ming 'di zhes bya ba'i nyon mongs pa'am sgrib pa thams cad /
T02D2634:185a-35: aom sarba p'a pam da ha na badzra ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2634:185a-36: zhes brjod cing til bsreg par bya'o //
T02D2634:185a-38: phyag na rdo rje phyag na pad zhags bsnams //
T02D2634:185a-39: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i gzugs //
T02D2634:185a-40: zhabs kyi padmas sdig mnan cing //
T02D2634:185a-41: rgyan rnams kun gyis rab rdzogs la //
T02D2634:185a-42: rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi dbu rgyan mtho //
T02D2634:185a-43: bsams sam yang na bris kyang rung //
T02D2634:185a-44: de yi snying bo de bzhin du //
T02D2634:185b-0: brgya phrag @185b stod dam yang na ni //
T02D2634:185b-1: bye ba'i tshad du sbyin sreg bya //
T02D2634:185b-3: de nas lha gshegs su gsol te /
T02D2634:185b-4: bdag nyid lus bsrung ba bya'o //
T02D2634:185b-5: de ltar bsregs nas thal bar gyur pa dang /
T02D2634:185b-6: rdo rje bsdu ba'i sngags sa ma ha ra n'a h'um /
T02D2634:185b-8: rus pa dang thal ba rnams bsdus nas /
T02D2634:185b-10: mchod rten gdab pa'i phyogs su gzhag go //
T02D2634:185b-11: de nas ga pur la sogs pa'i dri chu dang /
T02D2634:185b-12: ba'i rnam lnga dang rus pa bsres te /
T02D2634:185b-13: ngan song sbyong ba'i sngags bzhi las gang yang rung
T02D2634:185b-14: ba'i sngags 'bum man chad bzlas la 'jim pa dang
T02D2634:185b-15: bsres la dkyil 'khor gyi lha gang yang rung ba'i
T02D2634:185b-16: gzugs su gdab pa'am yang na mchod rten du byas
T02D2634:185b-17: te / mchod rten gcig gdab pa dang /
T02D2634:185b-20: brgya rtsa brgyad gdab pa man chad kyi bar du
T02D2634:185b-21: gzhung dang mthun par sngags dang phyag rgyas tshul bzhin
T02D2634:185b-22: du btab nas / sku'am mchod rten gyi spyan sngar
T02D2634:185b-23: ngan song sbyong ba'i sngags 'bum phrag nyis brgya man
T02D2634:185b-24: du btab nas / chad bzlas so // de nas
T02D2634:185b-25: mchod rten 'bar ba la sogs mtshan ma bzang po
T02D2634:185b-27: ci ste mtshan ma de dag ma mthong na /
T02D2634:185b-28: 'bum phrag brgya stong man chad bzlas shing ji srid
T02D2634:185b-29: mtshan ma dge ba dag ma byung gi bar du
T02D2634:185b-30: / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mchod cing /
T02D2634:185b-31: rtse gcig pa'i sems kyis mnyam par gzhag ste bzlas brjod bya /
T02D2634:185b-32: de ltar bzlas pa'i mthar mtshan gcig tu bzlas la /
T02D2634:185b-34: shi ba nges par sdig pa las grol zhing mtshan ma bzang po rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2634:185b-36: de nas thal bar gyur pa dang //
T02D2634:185b-37: rdo rje bsdu ba'i sngags kyis ni //
T02D2634:185b-38: cho ga bzhin du bsdu bar bya //
T02D2634:185b-39: thal ba de yang rus pa'i rdul //
T02D2634:185b-40: sngags kyis btab pa'i dri chu dang //
T02D2634:185b-41: ba skyes 'o ma la sogs lngas //
T02D2634:185b-42: sbyong ba'i sngags kyis blo ldan gyis //
T02D2634:185b-43: 'bum du bzlas pa rdzogs nas ni //
T02D2634:185b-44: ga bur dri yis bsgos pa yis //
T02D2634:185b-45: 'jim pa dang ni bsres nas kyang //
T02D2634:185b-46: gzugs su bya'am yang na ni //
T02D2634:185b-47: mchod rten gyi ni ltar byas la //
T02D2634:185b-48: gcig gam gnyis sam gsum mam lnga //
T02D2634:185b-49: yang na brgya rtsa brgyad du bya //
T02D2634:186a-1: dang phyag rgyas btab nas kyang //
T02D2634:186a-2: 'bum phrag gnyis kyi bar du bzlas //
T02D2634:186a-3: de nas mchod rten 'bar gyur tam //
T02D2634:186a-4: yang na gzugs kyi zhal 'dzum mam //
T02D2634:186a-5: dri dang bdug pa 'od kyang rung //
T02D2634:186a-6: snang ngam yang na ngad ldang ngam //
T02D2634:186a-7: lha la sogs pa'i rnam pa ni //
T02D2634:186a-8: sna tshogs bar ni snang gyur tam //
T02D2634:186a-10: me tog la sogs 'bar ba dang //
T02D2634:186a-11: dung dang rnga la sogs pa'i sgra //
T02D2634:186a-12: dril bu pi wang la sogs rnams //
T02D2634:186a-13: ci ste mtshan ma de dag ni //
T02D2634:186a-14: sdig can blos ni mi mthong na //
T02D2634:186a-15: 'bum gyi phrag ni brgyad stong ngam //
T02D2634:186a-16: ji srid mtshan ma byung bar du //
T02D2634:186a-17: de bzhin gshegs rnams mchod nas ni //
T02D2634:186a-18: mnyam par gzhag pas bzlas par bya //
T02D2634:186a-19: de yi mthar ni mkhas pas kyang /
T02D2634:186a-20: mtshan gcig mi nyal thog mar bzlas //
T02D2634:186a-21: de nas de yi sdig pa ni //
T02D2634:186a-22: dag pa nyid du nges par mthong //
T02D2634:186a-24: shi ba'i bar du med na cho ga bya ba'i thabs kyang /
T02D2634:186a-26: yang na med par gyur na yang //
T02D2634:186a-27: bzlas shing bsgom pa'i tshul gyis ni //
T02D2634:186a-28: ming tsam legs par bris nas ni //
T02D2634:186a-29: mchod rten phreng bar bya ba dang //
T02D2634:186a-30: yang na gzugs su byas kyang rung //
T02D2634:186a-31: sbyin sreg mngon par dbang bskur ro ;
T02D2634:186a-32: / gdon mi za bar mtho ris skye //
T02D2634:186a-34: rus pa med na yang bdag nyid lha'i rnal 'byor du bsgoms shing bzlas brjod bya ba dang /
T02D2634:186a-36: yang na gzugs brnyan gyi nang du ming rnams kyis bsngags te /
T02D2634:186a-37: na ma: sa manta buddh'a n'a na /
T02D2634:186a-38: ai tsi pa ra na ma no ma /
T02D2634:186a-39: zhes bya ba bris nas bcug la /
T02D2634:186a-42: phyag rgyas dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D2634:186a-43: sbyin sreg gi dkyil 'khor bya ba dang /
T02D2634:186a-44: thal ba las mchod rten mang po'am /
T02D2634:186a-45: sku gzugs gdab pa la sogs pa gong du smos pa'i cho ga ltar byas nas /
T02D2634:186a-46: sgrib pa rnams zad nas bde 'gro lha'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2634:186a-47: de ltar mchod rten nam sku btab pa'i tsha tshad
T02D2634:186a-48: rnams lam gyi bzhi mdor mchod rten chen po byas
T02D2634:186a-49: te / de'i nang du bcug la /
T02D2634:186a-50: mchod pa dag gis mchod nas /
T02D2634:186a-51: 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la mchod bstod gsol /
T02D2634:186b-1: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis che ge mo bde 'gro
T02D2634:186b-2: mtho ris lha'i 'jig rten du skye bar gyur cig
T02D2634:186b-3: ces brjod la / de bzhin du 'gyur ba'am /
T02D2634:186b-4: yang na tsha tsha btab pa rnams rgya mtsho chen
T02D2634:186b-5: po'am chu klung du dor na gang dag rdul des
T02D2634:186b-6: reg pa thams cad mtho ris thob cing dge ba'i
T02D2634:186b-7: rtsa ba 'dis che ge mo ngan song las thar
T02D2634:186b-8: bar gyur cig ces brjod na de bzhin du 'gyur
T02D2634:186b-9: ro zhes gzhan las bshad do //
T02D2634:186b-10: gong du smos pa bzhin cho ga ma nus na thabs gzhan yang rgyud las /
T02D2634:186b-11: thal ba yungs kar bye ma sogs //
T02D2634:186b-12: rang gi ming smos sngags btab nas /
T02D2634:186b-13: bzlas pa byas te song nas kyang ;
T02D2634:186b-14: / rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i klung du dor //
T02D2634:186b-17: bye ma'am dri la shi ba'i ming dang /
T02D2634:186b-18: sarba bid la sogs pa'i ngan song sbyong ba'i sngags
T02D2634:186b-19: spel nas 'bum man chad bzlas shing btab ste chu
T02D2634:186b-20: klung chen por dor na ngan song las thar bar
T02D2634:186b-21: 'gyur ro // gong du smos pa lta bu'i ro'i cho ga byas pa rnams kyi yon tan yang /
T02D2634:186b-22: rgyud las de ltar na ni sdig can yang //
T02D2634:186b-23: ngan song las ni thar bar 'gyur //
T02D2634:186b-24: dge ba'i chos ni bskyed pa dang //
T02D2634:186b-25: byang chub sa bon bskyed pa'i bdag / sangs rgyas 'bras bu rgyud ldan pa //
T02D2634:186b-26: sbyin ba'i pha rol phyin par ldan //
T02D2634:186b-27: tshul khrims rgyu dang rab ldan pa //
T02D2634:186b-28: bzod pa brtson 'grus mnyam gzhag dang //
T02D2634:186b-29: shes rab rnams kyi rgyu bsgoms pa'i //
T02D2634:186b-30: 'jig rten bsod nams ldan ci smos //
T02D2634:186b-31: myur du de ni ngan song ni //
T02D2634:186b-32: bcom par 'gyur te the tshom med //
T02D2634:186b-35: dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed las //
T02D2634:186b-36: med par lta ba gang yin dang //
T02D2634:186b-37: byang chub lam las rnam ldog pas //
T02D2634:186b-38: bstan la zhe sdang gnod byed cing //
T02D2634:186b-39: sdig pa'i rang bzhin ma mthong la //
T02D2634:186b-40: pha dang ma la snying ring zhing //
T02D2634:186b-41: byang chub sems la brten pa dang //
T02D2634:186b-42: 'dod chags bral ba bsad pa rnams //
T02D2634:186b-43: ci ste lha rnams med gyur tam //
T02D2634:186b-44: sangs rgyas dge 'dun chos de bzhin //
T02D2634:186b-45: sngags dang phyag rgya'i tshogs la sogs //
T02D2634:186b-46: shes rab thabs rnams med na ni //
T02D2634:186b-47: sdig can de dag mi thar zhes //
T02D2634:186b-48: bde gshegs rgyal ba nyid kyis gsungs //
T02D2634:187a-0: de lta bu'i mi dge ba'i mtshams @187a * //
T02D2634:187a-3: 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa yang rung ste /
T02D2634:187a-4: las kyi sgrib pa rnams zad par 'gyur ro zhes lung gzhan dag las 'byung ngo //
T02D2634:187a-5: ngan song sbyong ba'i rgyal po brtag pa yi //
T02D2634:187a-6: shi ba'i don du cho gar gsungs pa las //
T02D2634:187a-7: 'gro ba'i don du bdag gis nyung zhig bsdus //
T02D2634:187a-8: 'di yis nyam thag sdug bsngal nyung bar shog /
T02D2634:187a-9: ngan song thams cad sbyong ba'i thabs zhes bya ba
T02D2634:187a-10: sbyin sreg gi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga / slob
T02D2634:187a-11: dpon skal bzang dga' bas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D2634:187a-13: // / rgya gar gyi mkhas pa chen po bla ma ni na shi dang /
